title: Water Quality Monitoring Alert
description: A sensor at the water treatment plant shows a sudden spike in turbidity levels in the raw water intake.

tasks.description: Receive and acknowledge the high turbidity alarm from the plant's SCADA system.
tasks.expected_outcome: System logs the critical water quality alarm.

tasks.description: Check upstream sensors and weather data to identify a potential cause, such as a heavy rainfall event causing runoff.
tasks.expected_outcome: System correlates the turbidity spike with a recent thunderstorm in the watershed.

tasks.description: Automatically adjust the coagulant dosage in the treatment process to handle the increased turbidity.
tasks.expected_outcome: System sends a new setpoint to the chemical dosing pumps.
